entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 6.
